## UseExtensionsConfig.requires property

A [CapabilitySpec](./uix-host.capabilityspec.md) describing the namespaced methods extensions must implement to be used by this component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
requires?: CapabilitySpec<Incoming>;
```

## Remarks

This declaration is used to filter the extensions that will be returned; if they don't implement those methods, they will be filtered out.
